item.title: Haskell & AppVeyor Chocolatey Introduction
item.description: For those who are unaware, Windows has had quite a push lately to provide script-able ways to install packages. One such attempt that has gained quite a lot of traction is Chocolatey https://chocolatey.org/. Chocolatey also contains some of my own packages for installing GHC and cabal (along with packages to fully automate setting up a GHC dev environment etc, more on these at a later date). The GHC package https://chocolatey.
